mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.doc_id AS "doc_id", a.date AS "date", a.zzzgs AS "zzzgs", a.wsjsry AS "wsjsry", a.qtjsry AS "qtjsry", a.glry AS "glry", a.gqjnry AS "gqjnry"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ironfo_con_emp( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, doc_id, date, zzzgs, wsjsry, qtjsry, glry, gqjnry ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{doc_id}, #{date}, #{zzzgs}, #{wsjsry}, #{qtjsry}, #{glry}, #{gqjnry} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ironfo_con_emp SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, doc_id = #{doc_id}, date = #{date}, zzzgs = #{zzzgs}, wsjsry = #{wsjsry}, qtjsry = #{qtjsry}, glry = #{glry}, gqjnry = #{gqjnry} WHERE id = #{id}
